column4: another question related to Ubuntu. it looks like an gnome-panel applet crashes from time to time during startup. Does any one experiencing this problem?
it happens sometimes, it's a known bug in gnome2 : https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=637219
unfortunately I'm not sure it will get fixed as gnome 2 is on the way out
it is these kind of basic features problem that  make me go back to Windows 7 every time
